biotools.summary: Meta-motif based statistical framework and pipeline to predict SELEX derived binding aptamers. Briefly, MPBind calculates four kinds of p-values (1-sided) for each motif, representing different features.

bioschemas.name: MPBind
bioschemas.summary: Meta-motif based statistical framework and pipeline to predict SELEX derived binding aptamers. Briefly, MPBind calculates four kinds of p-values (1-sided) for each motif, representing different features.
